metadata.title: CVE-2024-5695 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: If an out-of-memory condition occurs at a specific point using allocationsin the probabilistic heap checker, an assertion could have been triggered,and in rarer situations, memory corruption could have occurred. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 127.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
